section.title: Importing and Exporting Policies, Policy Profiles, and Alerts
section.para: If you have multiple VMDBs, you can export policies, policy profiles, or alerts from one to another. You can export and import for use with other CloudForms Management Engine infrastructures.

procedure.title: To Import a Policy, Policy Profile, or an Alert

step.para: Copy the file to import to a location that is accessible to your CloudForms Management Engine Console.
Click Browse to navigate to the location of the file.
Select the file, and then click Open from the file selection box.
Verify that these are the policies or policy profiles that you want to import.
